artist: Artist: Tsukioka Yoshitoshi; Publisher: Yorozuya Magobei; Carver: Watanabe Eizō I
catalogue_raissonne: Keyes, Courage and Silence (1982), no. 337.1; Iwakiri, Yoshitoshi (2014), p. 301.
creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation, gifts of various donors, by exchange, and gift of Edmond Freis in memory of his parents, Rose and Leon Freis
description: portrait of a man with bushy hair in hairstyle with rounded areas at sides of head, back of neck and sideburns; man's head turned slightly to PR, with a grimacing expression; man wears brightly colored garments of various patterns, with yellow floral patterns on blue on shoulders and black and grown armor on PL arm, with hand in front of chest; large red tassel on PR shoulder; border around portrait rectangle has abstracted save design in blues and white, with yellow dots
markings: Carver’s seal: 渡辺彫栄 {Watanabe hori Ei}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Seven Brilliant Stars (Kōmei shichi yōsei 光明七陽盛)
signed: 応需よしとし筆 {ōju Yoshitoshi hitsu}
title: Lake: Actor Ichikawa Sadanji I as Akechi Samanosuke
